name: Lighthouse Keeper (itch) (thomasjammes)
description:
-------Made for the Trijam 191 "Isolated"---------

You're the last Lighthouse Keeper and the night is dark...really dark...

Keep the boats away from he coast all night long.

 But  beware! this lighthouse is kind of rusty and things might be broken.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

unfortunately this project has not been done in 3h, it took me waaaay more time but I really wanted to polish  it : )

it was my first attempt using Godot engine. Took me a while to know what I was doing but it was so fun to use!
